scripts.deploy:github: npm run build:github && npm run deploy && npm run restore:homepage
scripts.build:github: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const pkg=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('package.json')); delete pkg.homepage; fs.writeFileSync('package.json', JSON.stringify(pkg, null, 2));" && npm run build
scripts.restore:homepage: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const pkg=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('package.json')); pkg.homepage='https://ekyeremeh7.github.io/portfolio'; fs.writeFileSync('package.json', JSON.stringify(pkg, null, 2));"
